title: Person In Lotus Position Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: meditating person medium light skin tone
description: A person meditating in the lotus position, with a medium-light skin tone. Represents peace, mindfulness, yoga, and spiritual practice.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the medium-light skin tone person in lotus position is depicted with serene grace, seated cross-legged in a meditative pose. Apple's characteristic soft rounded edges and smooth 3D shading create a sense of peacefulness and balance, with gentle highlights suggesting inner calm. This emoji symbolizes mindfulness, yoga, relaxation, or a quest for inner peace and tranquility in digital communication.
